name: nodewizard
description: This repo need to import when we start a new project

scripts.test2: npm run start-watch && npm run wp-server
scripts.test3parallal: npm run ins3 && npm run ins4 && npm run ins5
scripts.test4series: npm run ins3 & npm run ins4 & npm run ins5
scripts.ins: npm install --save express body-parser morgan mysql  && npm install --save-dev nodemon  && mkdir api\routes && cd api/routes && echo routes >router.js && cd ../../ && mkdir api\models && cd api/models && echo model >model.js && cd ../../ && mkdir api\controllers && cd api/controllers && echo controller >controller.js && cd ../../ && mkdir api\views && cd api/views && echo view >view.js && cd ../../ && mkdir public && cd public && echo html > index.js && cd ../ && mkdir documentation\postManDocumentation && cd documentation/postManDocumentation && echo postManDocumentation > postManDocumentation.md && cd ../../ && mkdir documentation\apiDocumentation && cd documentation/apiDocumentation && echo apiDocumentation > apiDocumentation.md && cd ../../ && echo node_modules > .gitignore && echo * text=auto > .gitattributes &&  npm run start

author: Aarif Husain
